content.question: Find all values of x for which the graph of h has a horizontal tangent, and determine whether h has a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at each of these values. Justify your answers.

frqParts.text: Find all values of x for which the graph of h has a horizontal tangent, and determine whether h has a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at each of these values. Justify your answers.

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
